title: Pisa: story of a cathedral square = Storia di una piazza: la piazza di Pisa
creator_credit: Romor Film, Este Film and Carlo Carlo Ludovico Ragghianti
brief_description: Spanning three centuries in construction, 1000 to 1300 AD, buildings of Cathedral Square in Pisa were planned to beautify an important sea-port. The relationship between the Cathedral, the Baptistry, the leaning tower and the Campo Santo is emphasised by the photography.
